response:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for (Iterator<Integer> it = li.iterator(); it.hasNext(); ) {
int current = it.next();
System.out.println(current);
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use an iterator to iterate through an ArrayList in the same manner as you did with the for-each loop. In this case, you can use the iterator's next() method to get the next integer in the list.
